original_text:
Boom Pirates
Unisciti ai Boom Pirates nella slot Wonderways di Foxium alimentato dalla piattaforma Quickfire di Microgaming. Navigherai in alto mare con il Capitano Mary e la sua banda di saccheggiatori mentre individuano un’isola per la loro prossima caccia al tesoro. Preparati per l’attacco mentre manovrano la nave verso il porto per il loro giro di saccheggi e un bottino di vincite fino a 3.800 volte la puntata. Continua a leggere i dettagli di questa incredibile slot a tema Pirati e realizza le migliori combinazioni vincenti.
Caratteristiche e funzionalità principali di Boom Pirates
Grazie alla funzionalità speciale Wonderways Reel Extension i rulli riescono ad espandersi fino a 10.077.696 modi diversi, mentre Mary oscillando casualmente su una corda ti garantirà una vittoria. Inoltre, grazie a 2 funzionalità extra, potrai ottenere un round bonus istantaneo e aumentare le possibilità di attivarlo. A tutto questo, aggiungi i Giri Gratuiti Yo Ho Ho e le tue vittorie si moltiplicheranno in un batter d’occhio.
Gameplay di Boom Pirates Wonderways
I cinque rulli di questa video slot con quattro file e 1.024 modi per vincere come impostazione predefinita possono aumentare fino a nove, con sei file e 10.077.696 modi attraverso l’innovativa  meccanica dei rulli Wonderways di nuova concezione. Le vincite vengono pagate da tre a sei simboli corrispondenti solo sui rulli adiacenti da sinistra a destra. Unisciti ai pirati su desktop o dispositivo mobile da 0,20 a 50 crediti per giro. L’utilizzo della funzionalità Foxify aumenterà l’intervallo da 0,30 a 75 crediti. Il gioco ha una volatilità media con un RTP del 96,19%. Foxium ha fatto davvero un ottimo lavoro, producendo un’autentica slot a tema Pirata. Grafica, animazione e colonna sonora si uniscono per creare un’atmosfera intensa e un’esperienza di gioco per il giocatore così realistica, che lo farà  sentire parte dell’equipaggio dei pirati.
Simbologia di Boom Pirates
L’isola che stanno per saccheggiare è visibile sullo sfondo della finestra di gioco, costruita con assi di legno. Le icone in pietra grigia con un teschio coprono le posizioni inattive del mulinello. La nave viene ormeggiata al largo indica che i pirati sono pronti ad approdare. Lo scenario cambia da luce diurna a notturna mentre i pirati si fanno strada attraverso il villaggio. Non appena attiverai il gioco, troverai le carte reali da 10 ad A all’estremità inferiore della tabella dei pagamenti. Colpire cinque o nove sui rulli pagherà rispettivamente da 1,2 a 5 volte e da 7,5 a 25 volte la tua puntata. Tra le icone presenti spiccano:

Barili di polvere da sparo
Cannoni
Pappagalli
Il primo ufficiale Ben
Il seducente capitano Mary.

Come attivare la Funzionalità Buy Bonus Yo Ho Ho
In questa slot online senza registrazione non ci sono simboli jolly ma grazie ad una divertente combinazione di scatter si attiveranno giri gratuiti sui rulli uno, tre e cinque al grido di battaglia piratesco: “Yo Ho Ho”. Questa funzione può essere attivata su qualsiasi giro nel gioco base e ti costerà il 50% in aggiunta alla tua scommessa predefinita: ad es. un giro con 3.00 crediti aumenterà a 4.00. Puoi anche optare per una scorciatoia per i giri gratuiti Yo Ho Ho facendo clic sulla confezione regalo arancione nell’area dei controlli per attivare l’opzione “Acquista funzionalità”. Ti costerà 100 volte la tua scommessa predefinita e ti porterà dritto ai giri gratuiti. Preparati per la caccia al tesoro del rullo principale quando atterri i tre simboli scatter che compongono “YO HO HO” sui rulli uno, tre e cinque in un giro o acquisti la funzione. Il gioco attiverà 10 Yo Ho Ho Free Spins, che non possono essere riattivati ​​come tali, ma colpendo nuovamente tre scatter durante la funzione assegnerà +5 giri gratuiti, senza limiti.
Quali sono le altre due funzioni extra di Boom Pirates?

Wonderways Reel Extension:  questa opzione si attiverà casualmente nel gioco base per aumentare la finestra di gioco fino alla dimensione massima di 9 × 6 con 10.077.696 per giro. I rulli e le righe extra vengono attivati ​​solo se contengono un simbolo vincente;
Mary’s Swashbuckling Attack: questa funzione si attiverà in modo casuale su un giro perdente nel gioco base. Mary si muoverà su una corda per cambiare i simboli per un cinque di un tipo garantito.

In cosa consiste in Round Bonus in Boom Pirates?
Prima dell’inizio della funzione, lo scenario cambia in un’ambientazione notturna con la nave pronta a sparare con i cannoni. La finestra di gioco aumenta fino alla dimensione massima con nove rulli e sei righe, tuttavia, il round inizierà con il formato predefinito 5 × 4 a 1.024 modi mentre tutte le altre posizioni sono coperte da icone di teschi. I cannoni della nave possono iniziare a sparare in modo casuale all’inizio di qualsiasi giro gratuito per scoprire un numero a caso di posizioni dei rulli. L’attacco del cannone può ripetersi fino a quando l’intera griglia con la dimensione massima di 9 × 6 e 10.077.696 modi è stata attivata. Qualsiasi estensione rimarrà attiva fino alla fine dei giri gratuiti.
Perché scegliere di giocare a Boom Pirates
Foxium ha impiegato quasi un anno dal primo annuncio per finire la slot Boom Pirates e guardando le complesse meccaniche e il set-up è abbastanza comprensibile. Sono uno studio di giochi relativamente piccolo che di solito rilascia non più di due o tre giochi all’anno. Ma è valsa la pena aspettare perché questa slot, che non ha bisogno di download ed è giocabile sia in Demo che con soldi veri,  è molto divertente con molte funzionalità e oggetti opzionali che i giocatori possono usare a loro piacimento. Il potenziale di vincita con 3.800 volte la scommessa dovrebbe accontentare sia gli scommettitori regolari che i Pro. Nel complesso, si tratta davvero di una creazione straordinaria che dovrebbe essere nella Wishlist  di chiunque.
Slot Gratis Simili a Boom Pirates
Se ami le slot con trame avventurose sui pirati, potresti provare anche i seguenti titoli, tutti giocabili sia in Dem

raw_translation.response:
Join the Boom Pirates in Foxium's Wonderways slot, powered by Microgaming's Quickfire platform. Set sail with Captain Mary and her band of plunderers as they search for the next island to raid. Get ready for battle as they maneuver the ship into port for their loot and winnings of up to 3,800 times the bet. Read on for details on this amazing pirate-themed slot and discover the best winning combinations.

Key Features of Boom Pirates

Thanks to the Wonderways Reel Extension feature, the reels can expand up to 10,077,696 different ways, while Mary swinging randomly on a rope guarantees you a win. In addition, with 2 extra features, you can get an instant bonus round and increase your chances of triggering it. Add in the Yo Ho Ho Free Spins and your winnings will multiply in no time.

Gameplay of Boom Pirates Wonderways

The five reels of this video slot with four rows and 1,024 ways to win as the default setting can increase up to nine, with six rows and 10,077,696 ways through the innovative Wonderways reel mechanism. Wins are paid from three to six matching symbols only on adjacent reels from left to right. Join the pirates on desktop or mobile device from 0.20 to 50 credits per spin. Using the Foxify feature will increase the range from 0.30 to 75 credits. The game has medium volatility with an RTP of 96.19%. Foxium has done an excellent job producing an authentic pirate-themed slot. Graphics, animation and sound combine to create an intense atmosphere and a gaming experience for the player that is so realistic, it will make you feel like part of the pirate crew.

Symbols of Boom Pirates

The island they are about to raid is visible in the background of the game window, built with wooden planks. The gray stone icons with a skull cover the inactive positions of the reel. The ship moored offshore indicates that the pirates are ready to land. The scenery changes from daylight to nighttime as the pirates make their way through the village. As soon as you activate the game, you will find the real cards from 10 to A at the bottom of the paytable. Hitting five or nine on the reels will pay respectively from 1.2 to 5 times and from 7.5 to 25 times your bet. Among the icons present are:

Gunpowder barrels
Cannons
Parrots
The first officer Ben
The seductive Captain Mary.

How to activate the Yo Ho Ho Buy Bonus Feature

In this online slot without registration, there are no wild symbols, but thanks to a fun scatter combination, free spins will be activated on reels one, three, and five with a pirate battle cry: "Yo Ho Ho." This feature can be activated on any spin in the base game, and will cost you 50% in addition to your default bet: e.g. a spin with 3.00 credits will increase to 4.00. You can also opt for a shortcut for Yo Ho Ho Free Spins by clicking on the orange gift box in the control area to activate the "Purchase Feature" option. It will cost you 100 times your default bet and take you straight to the free spins. Get ready for the main reel treasure hunt when you land the three scatter symbols that make up "YO HO HO" on reels one, three, and five in one spin or buy the feature. The game will activate 10 Yo Ho Ho Free Spins, which cannot be reactivated as such, but hitting three scatters again during the feature will award +5 free spins, with no limits.

What are the other two extra functions of Boom Pirates?

Wonderways Reel Extension: This option will be activated randomly in the base game to increase the game window up to the maximum size of 9x6 with 10,077,696 per spin. The extra reels and rows are only activated if they contain a winning symbol;
Mary's Swashbuckling Attack: This feature will be activated randomly on a losing spin in the base game. Mary will move on a rope to switch symbols for a guaranteed five of a kind.

What is the Round Bonus in Boom Pirates?

Before the start of the feature, the setting changes to a nighttime scene with the ship ready to fire its cannons. The game window increases up to the maximum size with nine reels and six rows; however, the round will start with the default 5x4 format with 1,024 ways while all other positions are covered with skull icons. The ship's cannons can start firing randomly at the beginning of any free spin to reveal a random number of reel positions. Cannonfire can repeat until the entire grid with the maximum size of 9x6 and 10,077,696 ways has been activated. Any extensions will remain active until the end of the free spins.

Why choose to play Boom Pirates?

Foxium took almost a year from the first announcement to finish the slot Boom Pirates, and looking at the complex mechanics and setup, it's quite understandable. They are a relatively small game studio that usually releases no more than two or three games per year. But it was worth the wait because this slot, which doesn't require a download and is playable both in Demo and with real money, is very fun with many features and optional items that players can use to their liking. The potential to win with 3,800 times the bet should satisfy both regular bettors and Pros. Overall, it's a truly amazing creation that should be on everyone's Wishlist.

Similar Free Slots to Boom Pirates

If you love adventure-themed slots about pirates, you might also try the following titles, all playable in Demo mode:

Join the Boom Pirates in the Wonderways slot game by Foxium, powered by Microgaming's Quickfire platform. Navigate the high seas with Captain Mary and her band of plunderers as they search for an island for their next treasure hunt. Get ready for the attack as they maneuver the ship into port for their round of looting and a booty of winnings up to 3,800 times your bet. Continue reading the details of this incredible pirate-themed slot and make the best winning combinations.

Key features and functionality of Boom Pirates

Thanks to the special Wonderways Reel Extension feature, the reels can expand up to 10,077,696 different ways, while Mary swinging casually on a rope will guarantee you a win. Additionally, with 2 extra features, you can get an instant bonus round and increase the chances of activating it. Add to all this the Yo Ho Ho Free Spins and your winnings will multiply in no time.

Gameplay of Boom Pirates Wonderways

The five reels of this video slot with four rows and 1,024 ways to win as the default setting can increase up to nine, with six rows and 10,077,696 ways through the innovative new Wonderways reel mechanics. Wins are paid from three to six matching symbols only on adjacent reels from left to right. Join the pirates on desktop or mobile device from 0.20 to 50 credits per spin. Using the Foxify feature will increase the range from 0.30 to 75 credits. The game has medium volatility with an RTP of 96.19%. Foxium has done a great job producing an authentic pirate-themed slot. Graphics, animation, and sound combine to create an intense atmosphere and a gaming experience so realistic that it will make you feel like part of the pirate crew.

Symbolism of Boom Pirates

The island they are about to plunder is visible in the background of the game window, built with wooden planks. The grey stone icons with a skull cover the inactive positions of the reel. The ship being anchored offshore indicates that the pirates are ready to land. The scenery changes from daylight to night as the pirates make their way through the village. As soon as you activate the game, you will find the real cards from 10 to A at the bottom of the paytable. Hitting five or nine on the reels will pay out respectively from 1.2 to 5 times and from 7.5 to 25 times your bet. Among the present icons stand out:

Barrels of gunpowder
Cannons
Parrots
The first officer Ben
The seductive Captain Mary.

How to activate the Yo Ho Ho Buy Bonus Feature

In this online slot game with no registration, there are no wild symbols, but thanks to a fun scatter combination, free spins will be activated on reels one, three, and five shouting the pirate battle cry: "Yo Ho Ho". This feature can be activated on any spin in the base game and will cost you 50% in addition to your default bet: for example, a spin with 3.00 credits will increase to 4.00. You can also opt for a shortcut for the Yo Ho Ho Free Spins by clicking on the orange gift box in the control area to activate the "Buy Feature" option. It will cost you 100 times your default bet and take you straight to the Free Spins. Get ready for the main reel treasure hunt when you land the three scatter symbols that make up "YO HO HO" on reels one, three, and five in one spin or buy the function. The game will trigger 10 Yo Ho Ho Free Spins, which cannot be reactivated as such, but hitting three scatter symbols again during the function will assign +5 free spins, with no limits.

What are the other two extra functions of Boom Pirates?

Wonderways Reel Extension: this option will be activated randomly in the base game to increase the game window up to the maximum size of 9 × 6 with 10,077,696 per spin. The extra reels and rows are activated only if they contain a winning symbol;
Mary's Swashbuckling Attack: this feature will be activated randomly on a losing spin in the base game. Mary will move on a rope to change the symbols for a guaranteed five of a kind.

What is the Round Bonus in Boom Pirates?

Before the start of the function, the scenery changes to a nighttime setting with the ship ready to fire with cannons. The game window increases to the maximum size with nine reels and six rows, however, the round will start with the default 5 × 4 format with 1,024 ways while all other positions are covered by skull icons. The ship's cannons can randomly start firing at the beginning of any free spin to uncover a random number of reel positions. The cannon attack can repeat itself until the entire grid with the maximum size of 9 × 6 and 10,077,696 ways has been activated. Any extension will remain active until the end of the free spins.

Why choose to play Boom Pirates?

Foxium took almost a year from the first announcement to finish the Boom Pirates slot, and looking at the complex mechanics and set-up it is quite understandable. They are a relatively small game studio that usually releases no more than two or three games a year. But it was worth the wait because this slot, which does not require any downloads and can be played both in Demo and with real money, is very fun with many features and optional items that players can use as they please. The potential payout of 3,800 times the bet should satisfy both regular bettors and Pros. Overall, it is truly an extraordinary creation that should be on everyone's wishlist.

Key features and functionality of Boom Pirates

Gameplay of Boom Pirates Wonderways

The five reels of this video slot with four rows and 1,024 ways to win as the default setting can increase up to nine, with six rows and 10,077,696 ways through the innovative new Wonderways reel mechanics. Using the Foxify feature will increase the range from 0.30 to 75 credits. The game has medium volatility with an RTP of 96.19%. Foxium has done a great job producing an authentic pirate-themed slot. Symbolism of Boom Pirates

The island they are about to plunder is visible in the background of the game window, built with wooden planks. The grey stone icons with a skull cover the inactive positions of the reel. The ship being anchored offshore indicates that the pirates are ready to land. The scenery changes from daylight to night as the pirates make their way through the village. As soon as you activate the game, you will find the real cards from 10 to A at the bottom of the paytable. Cannons
Parrots

How to activate the Yo Ho Ho Buy Bonus Feature

In this online slot game with no registration, there are no wild symbols, but thanks to a fun scatter combination, free spins will be activated on reels one, three, and five shouting the pirate battle cry: "Yo Ho Ho". This feature can be activated on any spin in the base game and will cost you 50% in addition to your default bet: for example, a spin with 3.00 credits will increase to 4.00. You can also opt for a shortcut for the Yo Ho Ho Free Spins by clicking on the orange gift box in the control area to activate the "Buy Feature" option. It will cost you 100 times your default bet and take you straight to the Free Spins. Get ready for the main reel treasure hunt when you land the three scatter symbols that make up "YO HO HO" on reels one, three, and five in one spin or buy the function. The game will trigger 10 Yo Ho Ho Free Spins, which cannot be reactivated as such, but hitting three scatter symbols again during the function will assign +5 free spins, with no limits.

What are the other two extra functions of Boom Pirates?

Wonderways Reel Extension: this option will be activated randomly in the base game to increase the game window up to the maximum size of 9 × 6 with 10,077,696 per spin. The extra reels and rows are activated only if they contain a winning symbol;
Mary's Swashbuckling Attack: this feature will be activated randomly on a losing spin in the base game. Mary will move on a rope to change the symbols for a guaranteed five of a kind.

What is the Round Bonus in Boom Pirates?

Before the start of the function, the scenery changes to a nighttime setting with the ship ready to fire with cannons. The game window increases to the maximum size with nine reels and six rows, however, the round will start with the default 5 × 4 format with 1,024 ways while all other positions are covered by skull icons. The ship's cannons can randomly start firing at the beginning of any free spin to uncover a random number of reel positions. The cannon attack can repeat itself until the entire grid with the maximum size of 9 × 6 and 10,077,696 ways has been activated. Any extension will remain active until the end of the free spins.
